alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jones, southern Lenoir, west central Craven, northwestern Onslow and central Duplin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kornegay, or 11 miles northeast of Warsaw, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kinston, Warsaw, Kornegay, Beulaville, Deep Run, Beautancus, Kenansville, Chinquapin, Potters Hill, Pleasant Hill, Wyse Fork, Albertson, Sarecta, Magnolia, Pink Hill, Dover, Sandy Bottom and Hargetts Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven
